getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: Everything you need to know to get up and running quickly

0.title: Welcome to Our Platform
0.description: A comprehensive introduction to our platform and its key features
0.content:
Welcome to Our Platform

Thank you for choosing our platform! This guide will help you get started and make the most of our features.

What You'll Learn

  • How to set up your account
  • Key features overview
  • Best practices for getting started

Getting Started

Our platform is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced user, you'll find everything you need to succeed.

Key Features

Explore our main features including event management, payment processing, user accounts, and security settings. Each feature is designed to work seamlessly together.

Next Steps

Once you've completed this introduction, we recommend exploring our other getting started guides to dive deeper into specific features.

1.title: Creating Your First Account
1.description: Step-by-step guide to setting up your account and profile
1.content:
Creating Your First Account

Setting up your account is quick and easy. Follow these steps to get started.

Step 1: Sign Up

Visit our sign-up page and provide your email address and create a secure password.

Step 2: Verify Your Email

Check your email for a verification link and click it to activate your account.

Step 3: Complete Your Profile

Add your personal information, profile picture, and preferences to personalize your experience.

Security Tips

  • Use a strong, unique password
  • Enable two-factor authentication
  • Keep your contact information up to date

2.title: Platform Navigation Guide
2.description: Learn how to navigate through our platform efficiently
2.content:
Platform Navigation Guide

Understanding how to navigate our platform will help you work more efficiently.

Main Navigation

The main navigation bar provides access to all major sections of the platform.

Dashboard Overview

Your dashboard is your central hub for managing all activities and accessing key information.

Quick Actions

Use quick action buttons to perform common tasks without navigating through multiple pages.

Search Functionality

Our powerful search feature helps you find what you need quickly across all sections.

3.title: Basic Settings Configuration
3.description: Configure your basic settings for optimal experience
3.content:
Basic Settings Configuration

Proper configuration ensures you get the most out of our platform.

Profile Settings

Update your personal information, contact details, and preferences.

Notification Preferences

Choose how and when you want to receive notifications.

Privacy Settings

Control who can see your information and activities.

Language and Region

Set your preferred language and regional settings for localized content.

4.title: Understanding User Roles
4.description: Learn about different user roles and permissions
4.content:
Understanding User Roles

Our platform supports different user roles with varying levels of access and permissions.

Admin Role

Administrators have full access to all features and can manage other users.

Manager Role

Managers can oversee specific areas and have elevated permissions.

User Role

Standard users have access to core features for their daily tasks.

Guest Role

Guests have limited access for viewing and basic interactions.

5.title: Mobile App Setup
5.description: Get started with our mobile application
5.content:
Mobile App Setup

Access our platform on the go with our mobile application.

Download and Installation

Download our app from the App Store or Google Play Store.

Login and Sync

Use your existing credentials to log in and sync your data.

Mobile-Specific Features

Discover features designed specifically for mobile users.

Offline Capabilities

Learn what you can do even when you're offline.

6.title: First Steps Checklist
6.description: A comprehensive checklist for new users
6.content:
First Steps Checklist

Complete these essential tasks to get the most out of our platform.

Account Setup

  • âœ“ Create your account
  • âœ“ Verify your email
  • âœ“ Complete your profile
  • âœ“ Set up two-factor authentication

Platform Familiarization

  • âœ“ Take the platform tour
  • âœ“ Explore the dashboard
  • âœ“ Try basic features
  • âœ“ Review help documentation

Customization

  • âœ“ Configure notification settings
  • âœ“ Set privacy preferences
  • âœ“ Customize your workspace

7.title: Common Beginner Mistakes
7.description: Avoid these common pitfalls when starting out
7.content:
Common Beginner Mistakes

Learn from others' experiences and avoid these common mistakes.

Security Oversights

Don't skip security setup - enable two-factor authentication and use strong passwords.

Incomplete Profile

A complete profile helps others connect with you and improves your experience.

Ignoring Notifications

Configure notifications properly to stay informed without being overwhelmed.

Not Exploring Features

Take time to explore all available features - you might discover something useful.

events.title: Events Management
events.description: Create, manage, and optimize your events effectively

0.title: Creating Your First Event
0.description: Learn how to create engaging events that attract attendees.
0.content:
Creating Your First Event

Learn how to create engaging events that attract attendees.

Event Planning Basics

Start with clear objectives and target audience identification.

Event Details

Provide comprehensive information including date, time, location, and description.

Ticket Configuration

Set up different ticket types and pricing options.

Publishing Your Event

Review all details before making your event live.

1.title: Event Registration Setup
1.description: Configure registration forms and attendee management
1.content:
Event Registration Setup

Streamline your registration process for better attendee experience.

Registration Forms

Create custom forms to collect necessary attendee information.

Approval Process

Set up automatic or manual approval workflows.

Confirmation Emails

Configure automated confirmation and reminder emails.

Waitlist Management

Handle overflow registrations with waitlist functionality.

2.title: Managing Event Attendees
2.description: Tools and strategies for effective attendee management
2.content:
Managing Event Attendees

Keep track of your attendees and enhance their experience.

Attendee Dashboard

Monitor registrations, check-ins, and attendee engagement.

Communication Tools

Send updates, announcements, and reminders to attendees.

Check-in Process

Streamline event day check-ins with digital tools.

Feedback Collection

Gather valuable feedback to improve future events.

3.title: Event Promotion Strategies
3.description: Effective ways to promote your events and increase attendance
3.content:
Event Promotion Strategies

Maximize your event's reach and attendance with proven promotion tactics.

Social Media Marketing

Leverage social platforms to create buzz around your event.

Email Campaigns

Design compelling email campaigns to drive registrations.

Partner Collaborations

Work with partners and sponsors to expand your reach.

Content Marketing

Create valuable content that attracts your target audience.

4.title: Virtual Event Best Practices
4.description: Guidelines for hosting successful virtual events
4.content:
Virtual Event Best Practices

Create engaging virtual experiences that rival in-person events.

Platform Selection

Choose the right virtual event platform for your needs.

Technical Setup

Ensure reliable internet, audio, and video quality.

Engagement Strategies

Keep virtual attendees engaged with interactive elements.

Follow-up Actions

Maintain connections and momentum after the virtual event.

5.title: Event Analytics and Reporting
5.description: Track performance and measure event success
5.content:
Event Analytics and Reporting

Use data to understand your event's performance and improve future events.

Key Metrics

Track registration rates, attendance, engagement, and satisfaction.

Real-time Monitoring

Monitor event performance as it happens.

Post-Event Analysis

Analyze comprehensive reports to identify successes and areas for improvement.

ROI Calculation

Measure the return on investment for your events.

6.title: Recurring Events Management
6.description: Set up and manage recurring events efficiently
6.content:
Recurring Events Management

Streamline the management of regular events and series.

Series Setup

Create event series with consistent branding and messaging.

Automated Scheduling

Set up automatic scheduling for regular events.

Attendee Retention

Strategies to keep attendees coming back to your events.

Content Planning

Plan content themes and speakers across your event series.

7.title: Event Troubleshooting Guide
7.description: Common issues and solutions for event management
7.content:
Event Troubleshooting Guide

Quick solutions to common event management challenges.

Registration Issues

Resolve problems with event registration and payment processing.

Technical Difficulties

Handle audio, video, and platform technical issues.

Attendee Communication

Address communication breakdowns and information gaps.

Last-Minute Changes

Manage unexpected changes and emergency situations.

payments.title: Payments & Billing
payments.description: Manage payments, billing, and financial transactions securely

0.title: Payment Methods Setup
0.description: Configure and manage your payment methods
0.content:
Payment Methods Setup

Set up secure payment methods for seamless transactions.

Supported Payment Methods

We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

Adding Payment Methods

Step-by-step guide to adding and verifying payment methods.

Security Measures

Learn about our security protocols and PCI compliance.

Default Payment Method

Set your preferred default payment method for convenience.

1.title: Understanding Billing Cycles
1.description: Learn about billing periods and payment schedules
1.content:
Understanding Billing Cycles

Get familiar with how billing works on our platform.

Billing Periods

Understand monthly, quarterly, and annual billing options.

Payment Due Dates

Learn when payments are processed and due dates.

Prorated Charges

How we handle mid-cycle changes and upgrades.

Billing Notifications

Configure alerts for upcoming payments and billing issues.

2.title: Invoice Management
2.description: Access, download, and manage your invoices
2.content:
Invoice Management

Keep track of all your financial transactions and invoices.

Accessing Invoices

Find and download your invoices from the billing section.

Invoice Details

Understand what's included in your invoices and billing statements.

Payment History

Review your complete payment history and transaction records.

Tax Information

How taxes are calculated and displayed on your invoices.

3.title: Refund and Cancellation Policy
3.description: Understand our refund process and cancellation terms
3.content:
Refund and Cancellation Policy

Learn about our fair and transparent refund policies.

Refund Eligibility

Understand when refunds are available and eligibility criteria.

Refund Process

Step-by-step guide to requesting and processing refunds.

Cancellation Terms

How to cancel subscriptions and what happens to your data.

Processing Times

Expected timeframes for refund processing and account changes.

4.title: Subscription Management
4.description: Upgrade, downgrade, and manage your subscription plans
4.content:
Subscription Management

Easily manage your subscription to match your changing needs.

Plan Comparison

Compare different subscription tiers and features.

Upgrading Your Plan

How to upgrade and what happens to your billing cycle.

Downgrading Your Plan

Process for downgrading and feature limitations.

Pause and Resume

Temporarily pause your subscription when needed.

5.title: Payment Security
5.description: Learn about our security measures and best practices
5.content:
Payment Security

Your financial security is our top priority.

Encryption and Security

How we protect your payment information with industry-standard encryption.

PCI Compliance

Our commitment to Payment Card Industry security standards.

Fraud Protection

Advanced fraud detection and prevention measures.

Best Practices

Tips to keep your payment information secure.

6.title: International Payments
6.description: Handle payments across different countries and currencies
6.content:
International Payments

Seamless payment processing for global users.

Supported Currencies

List of supported currencies and exchange rate policies.

International Fees

Understanding additional fees for international transactions.

Tax Compliance

How we handle VAT, GST, and other international taxes.

Regional Restrictions

Payment method availability by region.

7.title: Payment Troubleshooting
7.description: Resolve common payment issues and errors
7.content:
Payment Troubleshooting

Quick solutions to common payment problems.

Failed Payments

Common reasons for payment failures and how to resolve them.

Card Declined Issues

What to do when your card is declined.

Billing Address Errors

Resolving billing address verification issues.

Contact Support

When and how to contact our billing support team.

account.title: Account Management
account.description: Manage your account settings, profile, and preferences

0.title: Profile Settings Overview
0.description: Complete guide to managing your profile information
0.content:
Profile Settings Overview

Keep your profile up-to-date and personalized.

Basic Information

Update your name, email, phone number, and other contact details.

Profile Picture

Upload and manage your profile picture for better recognition.

Bio and Description

Add a professional bio to help others understand your background.

Social Links

Connect your social media profiles and professional networks.

1.title: Privacy and Visibility Settings
1.description: Control who can see your information and activities
1.content:
Privacy and Visibility Settings

Take control of your privacy with granular visibility settings.

Profile Visibility

Choose who can view your profile and contact information.

Activity Privacy

Control visibility of your activities and participation.

Search Visibility

Decide if your profile appears in search results.

Data Sharing

Manage how your data is shared with third parties.

2.title: Notification Preferences
2.description: Customize how and when you receive notifications
2.content:
Notification Preferences

Stay informed without being overwhelmed by customizing your notifications.

Email Notifications

Choose which emails you want to receive and their frequency.

Push Notifications

Configure mobile and browser push notifications.

SMS Alerts

Set up text message alerts for urgent updates.

Notification Schedule

Set quiet hours and preferred notification times.

3.title: Account Security Settings
3.description: Enhance your account security with advanced settings
3.content:
Account Security Settings

Protect your account with robust security measures.

Password Management

Create strong passwords and update them regularly.

Two-Factor Authentication

Add an extra layer of security with 2FA setup.

Login History

Monitor your account access and login activities.

Device Management

Manage and remove trusted devices from your account.

4.title: Data Export and Backup
4.description: Export your data and create backups of your information
4.content:
Data Export and Backup

Keep control of your data with export and backup options.

Data Export Options

Export your data in various formats for backup or migration.

Backup Scheduling

Set up automatic backups of your important information.

Data Portability

Understand your rights to data portability and transfer.

Recovery Options

How to recover data from backups when needed.

5.title: Account Deactivation
5.description: Temporarily or permanently deactivate your account
5.content:
Account Deactivation

Understand your options for account deactivation and deletion.

Temporary Deactivation

Temporarily disable your account while preserving your data.

Permanent Deletion

Permanently delete your account and all associated data.

Data Retention

What happens to your data during and after deactivation.

Reactivation Process

How to reactivate a temporarily deactivated account.

6.title: Multiple Account Management
6.description: Manage multiple accounts and switch between them
6.content:
Multiple Account Management

Efficiently manage multiple accounts from a single interface.

Account Switching

Quickly switch between different accounts you manage.

Shared Access

Grant access to team members for collaborative account management.

Account Linking

Link related accounts for easier management.

Billing Consolidation

Consolidate billing across multiple accounts.

7.title: Account Recovery
7.description: Recover access to your account if you're locked out
7.content:
Account Recovery

Regain access to your account with our recovery options.

Password Reset

Reset your password using email or SMS verification.

Email Recovery

Recover access when you no longer have access to your email.

Identity Verification

Verify your identity for account recovery assistance.

Support Contact

When to contact support for account recovery help.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: Protect your account and data with advanced security features

0.title: Two-Factor Authentication Setup
0.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
0.content:
Two-Factor Authentication Setup

Secure your account with two-factor authentication (2FA).

Why Use 2FA

Understand the importance of two-factor authentication for account security.

Setup Process

Step-by-step guide to enabling 2FA on your account.

Authentication Methods

Choose from SMS, authenticator apps, or hardware keys.

Backup Codes

Generate and safely store backup codes for emergency access.

1.title: Password Security Best Practices
1.description: Create and manage strong, secure passwords
1.content:
Password Security Best Practices

Learn how to create and maintain secure passwords.

Strong Password Creation

Guidelines for creating passwords that are both strong and memorable.

Password Managers

Benefits of using password managers for better security.

Regular Updates

How often to change passwords and when immediate changes are needed.

Common Mistakes

Avoid these common password security mistakes.

2.title: Recognizing Phishing Attempts
2.description: Identify and avoid phishing scams and fraudulent communications
2.content:
Recognizing Phishing Attempts

Protect yourself from phishing attacks and fraudulent communications.

Common Phishing Tactics

Learn to identify suspicious emails, messages, and websites.

Verification Methods

How to verify legitimate communications from our platform.

Reporting Suspicious Activity

How to report potential phishing attempts and security threats.

Recovery Steps

3.title: Data Privacy Controls
3.description: Understand and control how your data is used and shared
3.content:
Data Privacy Controls

Data Collection

Understand what data we collect and why.

Privacy Settings

Third-Party Sharing

Your Rights

4.title: Secure Device Management
4.description: Manage and secure devices connected to your account
4.content:
Secure Device Management

Keep track of and secure all devices accessing your account.

Device Registration

Active Sessions

Device Removal

Security Alerts

5.title: API Security and Access Tokens

5.content:
API Security and Access Tokens

Access Token Security

Rate Limiting

Monitoring API Usage

6.title: Security Incident Response

6.content:
Security Incident Response

Quick action steps if you suspect your account has been compromised.

Immediate Actions

Securing Your Account

Reporting Incidents

Recovery Process

7.title: Compliance and Certifications

7.content:
Compliance and Certifications

Security Certifications

Compliance Standards

Regular Audits

Transparency Reports

API Integration Guide

5.title: Error Code Reference
5.description: Understand and resolve common error codes
5.content:
Error Code Reference

Quick reference guide for common error codes and their solutions.

Authentication Errors

Error codes related to login and authentication issues.

Network Errors

Connection and network-related error codes.

Server Errors

Server-side error codes and what they mean.

Client Errors

Browser and client-side error codes and fixes.

6.title: Data Backup and Recovery
6.description: Technical aspects of data backup and recovery procedures
6.content:
Data Backup and Recovery

Technical details about our backup systems and recovery procedures.

Backup Systems

How our automated backup systems protect your data.

Recovery Procedures

Step-by-step data recovery processes.

Data Integrity

How we ensure data integrity and prevent corruption.

Disaster Recovery

Our disaster recovery plans and procedures.

7.title: Advanced Troubleshooting
7.description: Advanced technical troubleshooting for complex issues
7.content:
Advanced Troubleshooting

Advanced techniques for resolving complex technical issues.

Diagnostic Tools

Built-in diagnostic tools and how to use them.

Log Analysis

How to read and analyze system logs for troubleshooting.

Network Diagnostics

Advanced network troubleshooting techniques.

Escalation Process

When and how to escalate technical issues to our support team.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

privacy.introduction: At Badji.net, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our services.

information_collection.title: Information We Collect
information_collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, information we obtain automatically when you use our services, and information from third-party sources.
information_collection.points: Personal information (name, email, phone) | Account information and preferences | Event and attendee data | Payment and billing information | Usage data and analytics | Device and browser information

information_use.title: How We Use Your Information
information_use.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.
information_use.points: Provide and maintain our services | Process payments and transactions | Send important notifications | Improve our services and user experience | Comply with legal obligations | Prevent fraud and abuse

information_sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
information_sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.
information_sharing.points: Service providers and business partners | Legal requirements and law enforcement | Business transfers and mergers | With your explicit consent | Aggregated and anonymized data

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
data_security.points: Encryption in transit and at rest | Regular security assessments | Access controls and authentication | Employee training and background checks | Incident response procedures

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and provide personalized content.
cookies.points: Essential cookies for functionality | Analytics cookies for usage insights | Marketing cookies for personalization | Third-party cookies from partners | Cookie management and preferences

user_rights.title: Your Rights and Choices
user_rights.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to access, update, delete, or restrict the processing of your data.
user_rights.points: Access your personal information | Correct inaccurate information | Delete your account and data | Restrict processing activities | Data portability rights | Withdraw consent

children_privacy.title: Children's Privacy
children_privacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
children_privacy.points: Age verification requirements | Parental consent procedures | Data deletion for underage users | Educational account protections

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website.
changes.points: Notification of policy changes | Effective date of updates | Your continued use constitutes acceptance | Right to discontinue service

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us using the information below.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please don't hesitate to contact us.

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our services. By using Badji.net, you agree to be bound by these terms.

terms.introduction: These Terms of Service govern your use of Badji.net's services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms and our Privacy Policy.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Badji.net, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
acceptance.points: Agreement to terms and conditions | Legal capacity to enter agreement | Compliance with applicable laws | Updates to terms and conditions

description.title: Description of Service
description.content: Badji.net provides event management and ticketing services through our web platform and mobile applications.
description.points: Event creation and management tools | Ticketing and registration services | Payment processing capabilities | Analytics and reporting features | Customer support services

user_accounts.title: User Accounts
user_accounts.content: You must create an account to use certain features of our service. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.
user_accounts.points: Account registration requirements | Password security responsibilities | Account information accuracy | Notification of unauthorized access | Account termination procedures

acceptable_use.title: Acceptable Use Policy
acceptable_use.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.
acceptable_use.points: Prohibited illegal activities | No harassment or abuse | Respect intellectual property rights | No spam or unsolicited communications | Compliance with event regulations

content.title: User Content
content.content: You retain ownership of content you create, but grant us certain rights to use, display, and distribute your content.
content.points: Content ownership rights | License to use content | Content moderation policies | Removal of inappropriate content | Backup and data retention

payment_terms.title: Payment Terms
payment_terms.content: Payment terms for our services, including subscription fees, transaction fees, and refund policies.
payment_terms.points: Subscription billing cycles | Transaction fee structure | Payment method requirements | Refund and cancellation policies | Tax responsibilities

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect and use your information.
privacy.points: Data collection practices | Information usage policies | Third-party data sharing | Security measures | User privacy rights

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: Our services and content are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual_property.points: Badji.net trademark rights | Copyright protection | User content licensing | Third-party intellectual property | DMCA compliance procedures

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: Our services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
disclaimers.points: Service availability disclaimers | Performance and reliability | Third-party service dependencies | User responsibility for content | Technical support limitations

limitation_liability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation_liability.content: Our liability for damages arising from your use of our services is limited as described in this section.
limitation_liability.points: Limitation of direct damages | Exclusion of indirect damages | Maximum liability amounts | Force majeure events | User indemnification

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from claims arising from your use of our services.
indemnification.points: User indemnification obligations | Defense of claims | Settlement authority | Notice requirements | Cooperation in defense

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement under certain circumstances as described in this section.
termination.points: Termination by user | Termination by Badji.net | Effect of termination | Data retention after termination | Survival of terms

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where Badji.net is incorporated.
governing_law.points: Applicable law and jurisdiction | Dispute resolution procedures | Arbitration requirements | Class action waivers | Legal venue

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these terms from time to time. We will notify you of material changes.
changes.points: Notification of changes | Effective date of modifications | Continued use acceptance | Right to discontinue service

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: Questions about these terms should be directed to our legal team.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact our legal team.

hero.title: Cookie Policy
hero.description: Learn about how we use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on Badji.net.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.description: Manage your cookie preferences below. You can enable or disable different types of cookies based on your preferences.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to deliver personalized advertisements and track marketing campaign effectiveness.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.content: We use cookies for various purposes to enhance your experience on our website:
howWeUse.point1: Remember your login status and preferences
howWeUse.point2: Analyze website traffic and user behavior

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: Some cookies on our website are set by third-party services such as Google Analytics, social media platforms, and advertising networks. These cookies are subject to the respective privacy policies of these third parties.

control.title: How to Control Cookies
control.content: You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer. You can also use our cookie preference center above to manage your choices.

hero.title: GDPR Compliance
hero.description: We are committed to protecting your personal data and complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

rights.title: Your Data Protection Rights
rights.description: Under GDPR, you have several rights regarding your personal data. Learn about your rights and how to exercise them.

access.title: Right of Access
access.description: You have the right to request copies of your personal data that we hold.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.description: You have the right to request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: You have the right to request deletion of your personal data under certain circumstances.

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: You have the right to request transfer of your data to another organization.

restriction.title: Right to Restrict Processing
restriction.description: You have the right to request restriction of processing of your personal data.

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.description: You have the right to object to processing of your personal data for certain purposes.

data.title: Data We Collect
data.description: We collect and process various types of personal data to provide our services effectively.

personal_information.title: Personal Information
personal_information.description: Basic identifying information you provide when creating an account.
personal_information.examples: Name and surname | Email address | Phone number | Profile picture

account_data.title: Account Data
account_data.description: Information related to your account and service usage.
account_data.examples: Account preferences | Login history | Service usage patterns | Subscription details

event_data.title: Event Data
event_data.description: Information about events you create or attend.
event_data.examples: Event details and descriptions | Attendee lists | Event analytics | Registration information

payment_information.title: Payment Information
payment_information.description: Financial data necessary for processing transactions.
payment_information.examples: Billing address | Payment method details | Transaction history | Invoice information

usage_analytics.title: Usage Analytics
usage_analytics.description: Data about how you interact with our services.
usage_analytics.examples: Page views and clicks | Feature usage statistics | Performance metrics | Error logs

communication_data.title: Communication Data
communication_data.description: Records of your communications with us.
communication_data.examples: Support tickets | Email correspondence | Chat messages | Feedback submissions

legal.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legal.description: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds under GDPR.

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: You have given clear consent for us to process your personal data for specific purposes.

contract.title: Contract Performance
contract.description: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract with you or to take steps at your request.

legitimate_interest.title: Legitimate Interest
legitimate_interest.description: Processing is necessary for our legitimate interests, provided your rights are not overridden.

exercise.title: Exercise Your Rights
exercise.description: To exercise any of your GDPR rights, please contact us using the information below. We will respond to your request within 30 days.
exercise.verificationNote: We may require identity verification for security purposes

hero.title: About Badji.net
hero.description: We're on a mission to make event management simple, powerful, and accessible for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower event organizers worldwide with the tools they need to create memorable experiences and build meaningful connections.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Badji.net was born from the frustration of organizing events with outdated, complicated tools. Our founders, experienced event organizers themselves, knew there had to be a better way. Starting in a small office in Tunis, we set out to build the event management platform we wished existed.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push the boundaries of what's possible in event technology.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Complex problems deserve simple, elegant solutions.

community.title: Community
community.description: We believe in the power of bringing people together.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Your events are important to you, and they're important to us too.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: We're a diverse team of passionate individuals from around the world.

cta.title: Join Our Journey
cta.description: Ready to be part of the future of event management?

hero.title: Join Our Team
hero.description: Help us build the future of event management. We're looking for passionate people to join our growing team.

impact.title: Make an Impact
impact.description: Your work directly affects millions of event organizers and attendees worldwide.

growth.description: We invest in your professional development with learning opportunities and mentorship.

culture.description: Work with talented, passionate people in a collaborative and inclusive environment.

benefits.description: Competitive salary, health insurance, flexible work arrangements, and more.
